actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: Resolves, that it is the sense of the Senate that the Administration of the Federal Energy Office should, and is hereby urged and requested to, promulgate new regulations which will alleviate the present high price of propane.

summary.text: Makes it the sense of the Senate that the Administration of the Federal Energy Office should, and is hereby urged and requested to, promulgate new regulations which will alleviate the present high price of propane.

titles.title: Resolves, that it is the sense of the Senate that the Administration of the Federal Energy Office should, and is hereby urged and requested to, promulgate new regulations which will alleviate the present high price of propane.
